title: Preet Gill – 2021 Comments on International Aid Cuts
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Preet Gill, the Shadow International Development Secretary, on 3 June 2021.
content:
The Government’s decision to cut the aid budget in the middle of a pandemic risks lives.
